modShortDescription: Spikes that make your life easier. Zombies have less chance to destroy your base. Holspikes 3 x 660 and iron spikes 3x 990. Very painful for players and zombies.
modDescription:
Spikes that make your life easier. Zombies have less chance to destroy your base. Holspikes 3 x 660 and iron spikes 3x 990 Very painful for players and zombies. Easy to manufacture like normal [spikes](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-spikes/). The standard is 3 x 33 that doesn’t really help. Optimized for A18 and A19\. The license is the property of six attempts and herrath. May be used freely but not sold or changed.
